query: SELECT br.id, br.status, br.totalHouseholds, br.successfulHouseholds, COUNT(hi.id) as insights_count, SUM(JSON_LENGTH(hi.talkingPoints)) as total_talking_points FROM batchRuns br LEFT JOIN householdInsights hi ON br.id = hi.batchRunId GROUP BY br.id ORDER BY br.id DESC LIMIT 5
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3cxdAvZmDe4snPE.root --database kFJtgTpgUE3TsdNQK7TMEr --execute SELECT br.id, br.status, br.totalHouseholds, br.successfulHouseholds, COUNT(hi.id) as insights_count, SUM(JSON_LENGTH(hi.talkingPoints)) as total_talking_points FROM batchRuns br LEFT JOIN householdInsights hi ON br.id = hi.batchRunId GROUP BY br.id ORDER BY br.id DESC LIMIT 5
